name: Devil's Day at the Races
description:
2D racing game where you control the obstacles and power-ups for the player car! The enemies are faster than you so use boosts to give yourself a boost of speed and use glue and walls to slow down your enemies. Get to the finish first to win!

Controls: Click the icons above the track to activate them and click the track afterward to add them to the track.

Tips

  • Placing them in front or inside of the car will activate them.
  • Boosts only affect the player car (red)
  • Placing walls or glue only affect the enemies.
